item.description:
Greetings!


You are Cordially Invited to:

The Greater Boston Young Republican (GBYR) Annual Holiday Party! **Please note the change in venue.**

The election is over and the holidays are upon us so come join us to help plan for the future and ring in the holidays!

Where: Lir Irish Pub and Restaurant
903 Boylston St., Boston, MA 02115
http://www.lironboyls...

What: Free Appetizers and Cash Bar

When: Tuesday December 16th

Time: 6:30 - 9pm

Cover: $10 with RSVP or $15 at the door

All are encouraged to attend so please bring a friend and take a moment to RSVP to Chuck286@aol.com by December 5th. Thank you.

From everyone at the GBYR Executive Board, we hope to see you on the 16th. Help us refuse to take this defeat lying down and start building the future of our party now!



Sincerely,


Nathaniel Ulrich
Nathaniel.ulrich@gmail.com
Chair

Greater Boston Young Republicans
http://www.gbyr.org...
item.name: The Boston Young Republicans December Meetup
